review: Its a lot smaller than it seems. Perfect for a netbook. If you have a 15 inch laptop, you might want to make sure you have all four nipples under it or modify it with a little bit of velcro. Makes a decent food tray if you live in your car. Nissan sentra note: you don't have to flip the wheel completely upside-down.
productTitle: Zone Tech Car Ipad Laptop/Eating Steering Wheel Desk
